Row.Text: Likes civilizations that has the same government and hates civilizations that declare war.

Every City -20% [ICON_Faith] Faith. After completing a building (except wonders), gain [Icon_Science] Science for 10% [ICON_Production] Production equal to the building. Monument +1 [ICON_Science] Science and +1 [ICON_Production] Production.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May not build Holy Site districts, gain Great Prophets, or found Religions.
+20% [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist and [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer points. +1 Diplomatic government slot after unlocking "Class Struggle" Civic.

A district unique to Soviet Union. Replaces the Campus district and cheaper to build.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Naukograd provides [ICON_Science] Science and a small amount of [ICON_Production] Production (Base +2 [ICON_Production]).

Soviet Union unique Mordern era unit that replaces the Infantry. Cheaper to construct and maintain. No [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] Oil required. Unlock by Mobilization civic.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Weaker than the Infantry but +20 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending.
